title: Moonlit Reflections by the Riverside
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference. The subject’s face identity must remain 100% UNCHANGED and PERFECTLY PRESERVED. Do NOT alter facial structure, proportions, symmetry, skin tone, skin texture, age, gender, expression, eye shape, eye size, eye distance, eyelids, eyebrows, nose shape, nostrils, lips, teeth, jawline, chin, cheekbones, forehead, hairline, facial hair, or any unique facial features. Exact likeness is mandatory.

Generate an ultra-realistic, cinematic portrait in vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Frame the subject from head down to just below the knees (near-knee crop), even if the reference image is not full-length—intelligently extend the lower body and environment in a way that perfectly matches the scene, lighting, and perspective.

Scene & Environment: A calm, cinematic nighttime riverside setting under a large bright full moon in a clear sky. Soft moonlight creates a gentle halo glow. In the background, a distant modern city skyline with colorful neon lights is softly blurred (bokeh effect). The foreground features a vintage olive-green jeep on the left with fallen dry leaves on it, and a classic white stone balcony railing on the right. An old lantern with a warm flame sits on the railing beside a small stack of books. Behind the subject, an old rustic house with creeping dry vines adds a moody, nostalgic atmosphere. Fallen autumn leaves are scattered on the ground.

Subject Appearance & Pose: A young South Asian man seated casually on a wooden stool. One leg bent and resting higher, the other relaxed down, natural confident posture. He is holding a small bouquet of white roses in one hand and a professional camera resting naturally in the other hand or lap. Expression is calm, thoughtful, slightly serious. He is looking slightly downward or forward, not directly smiling.

Clothing & Accessories: Light pastel pink t-shirt with a minimal graphic, layered with an open light-colored plaid/checkered shirt. Black ripped jeans with visible knee tears. Black high-top boots. Dark stylish sunglasses worn naturally. Subtle wristwatch and minimal accessories only if visible in reference.

Lighting & Mood: Cinematic low-key lighting with a mix of cool moonlight and warm practical light from the lantern. Soft rim light outlining the subject. Natural shadows, realistic depth, professional photography look. Shallow depth of field with sharp focus on the subject.

Photography Style & Quality: Ultra-realistic DSLR photo look, 85mm lens feel, f/1.8 depth of field, high dynamic range, crisp details, natural skin texture, no over-beautification, no stylization. Color grading is cinematic teal-orange but subtle and realistic.

Constraints: Do NOT beautify, stylize, cartoonize, or change the face in any way. No face swapping, no face enhancement, no AI-beauty effects. Body proportions must look natural. Clothing, pose, and environment must remain consistent with the reference image. Ensure the final image is fully filled to 1080x1920 with intelligent background and lower-body extension if needed, matching perspective and lighting perfectly. for this prompt give me title
